entry.title: 3M WLX-1 - 3M Wire Pulling Lubricant Wax, WLX-1 7000006087
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 25.61

[shortdesc]

3M Wire Pulling Lubricant Wax, WLX-1

  • 3M™ Wire Pulling Lubricant is a grey, wax-based emulsion that has excellent lubricating properties for smooth, low-tension wire and cable pulling
  • This wax wipes off the cable quickly and cleanly before terminating or splicing
  • The lubricant has a low coefficient of friction, which lessens the chance of cable jacket damage from high pulling forces.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Low coefficient of friction lessens the chance of cable jacket damage
  • 5.3% solid residue for easier cable replacement
  • Compatible with a wide range of jacket material and semi-conducting materials
  • Grey, wax-based emulsion
  • Grey, wax-based emulsion
  • Withstands a temperature range of 10 to 194 °F (-12 to 90 °C)
  • UL/cUL Listed and RoHS 2011/65/EU Compliant
    		•

entry.title: 3M 08852 - Cavity Wax Plus 3M-08852 7100081897
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 32.48

[shortdesc]

08852, Cavity Wax Plus

  • Corrosion protection for internal body panels, frame rails and structural enclosures Non-hardening material remains soft and pliable – will not crack, chip, or peel Use with 3M™ Cavity Wax Plus Applicator Wand Kit (sold separately) to ensure 360° coverage in closed cavities Convenient aerosol spray can eliminates need for bulk spray equipment
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 684.88

[shortdesc]

HANG-ON

  • HANG-ON™ is a highly adhesive maintenance lubricant that provides effective, long-lasting lubrication under harsh conditions and over extended periods of time.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Walter

    Extra Product Information

  • Adhesive lubricant

    • Product Information

  • Silicone-free chlorinated solvent
  • Leaves a tacky, clear, no-drip, durable film that resists wear
  • Working temperature: -35 to 200°C
  • Adheres extremely well to surfaces
  • Biodegradable
  • Displaces water and moisture
  • Penetrates fine clearances

entry.summary:
Vendor: Walter
Type:
Price: 22.75

ROCK'N ROLL

  • ROCK’N ROLL™ is an inert, nontoxic, metal-free white lubricant that prevents seizing of assemblies

  • Highly effective in a wide range of temperatures (-30C or -22°F to 1400C or 2500°F) and in extreme conditions.
